scripts.i: yarn && ( cd ios && bundle exec pod install --repo-update)
scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules&& yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.pod: clear && clear && cd ios && pod install
scripts.podCleani: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm Podfile.lock && pod install
scripts.podReset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.cleani: clear && clear && set -e; rm -rf node_modules || true && rm -f yarn.lock || true && rm -rf ./ios/Pods || true && rm -f ./ios/Podfile.lock || true && rm -rf ./ios/build || true && yarn cache clean && (command -v watchman >/dev/null 2>&1 && watchman watch-del-all || true) && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* $TMPDIR/haste-map-* || true && yarn install && (cd ios && ((bundle exec pod deintegrate || pod deintegrate || true) && (bundle exec pod cache clean --all || pod cache clean --all || true) && (bundle exec pod install --repo-update || pod install --repo-update)))
scripts.cleana: clear && clear && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf build && rm yarn.lock && rm -rf ./android/app/build && rm -rf ./android/.gradle && yarn cache clean && yarn && cd android && ./gradlew clean -x lint && cd ..
scripts.gradleClean: clear && clear && cd android && ./gradlew clean -x lint && cd ..
scripts.gradleSync: clear && clear && cd android && ./gradlew build -x lint && cd ..
scripts.aBuild: clear && clear && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease -x lint
